name: Hypnosis Sister Clicker
description:
In Hypnosis Sister Clicker, click to generate Hypnosis Pt
and hypnotize the lovely sister!

The basics of the game is to click the sister to generate Hypnosis Pt.
Use these Hypnosis Pt to unlock items, and generate even more Hypnosis Pt!

Click a lot to enter "Fever Time"
and generate tons of Hypnosis Pt!
During "Fever Time", you can watch hypnotized sister doing lewd stuff!
You can also use Hypnosis Pt to unlock various H scenes!
Keep on clicking to see cute sister's H scenes!
